Translation:

United States 
Horror / Thriller 
88 minutes 

directed by John Carpenter 
Amber Heard, Danielle Panabaker, and Lyndsy Fonseca 

' The Ward ' follows Kristen ( Amber Heard ), a young girl against her will is admitted to a psychiatric institution. Christian is beaten, drugged and wake up full of painful wounds. She has no idea where she is and why. She meets four other " crazy " girls with their own problems, but who have no answers for Kristen. Soon they discovered that the body is full of dark secrets. As night falls and darkness is all they hear strange noises in the hallways. They are not alone...
